name: Sylvie's Smoked Salmon & Pistachio Lollipops
description: Simple to prepare and they make for a wonderful presentation - sure to make your dinner guests smile.
preparation: In a bowl, stir cream cheese with salmon and dip mix.
Using a 1 tbsp measuring spoon as a guide, form cheese into balls. Refrigerate until firm.

Place pistachios in another bowl. Working with one cheese ball at a time, coat with nuts. Insert lollipop stick into centre of cheese ball. Place on a serving platter and repeat with remaining ingredients. Serve chilled or at room temperature.
tips: Make Ahead Tip:  Prepare cheese balls, but don’t coat with pistachios. Cover and refrigerate up to 2 days. Store nuts in an airtight container. Assemble up to 6 hours before serving and refrigerate.

products.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix
summary: Beyond being one of our most-loved kid-friendly dips – they love it for dunking chicken strips, fish bites, and veggies – Lemon Dilly is all about versatility. With loads of dill and a hint of lemon zest, it makes an utterly delicious tzatziki and spread for burgers and sandwiches, and levels up everything from salad dressing and salmon to pasta and vegetables.
